attributes.action: Give the entertainment and leisure industry official instruction to close
attributes.additional_details: Without this instruction, and with advice not to attend venues, the industry will collapse with no income and hundreds of thousands of people are at risk of unemployment in the immediate future.
attributes.background: Give the entertainment and leisure industry official instruction to close premises so they can secure compensation and insurances

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs, restaurants and leisure facilities are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
